scripts.clean: rimraf build/api-doc && rimraf build/angular && rimraf build/docs && rimraf build/node_packages && rimraf build/spring-openapi
scripts.build: npm run clean && run-p build:angular build:docs
scripts.build:prepare:default: mkdir -p build/api-doc || mkdir -p build/angular || mkdir -p build/node_packages
scripts.build:prepare:win32: if not exist build\api-doc md build\api-doc && if not exist build\angular md build\angular && if not exist build\node_packages md build\node_packages
scripts.build:angular: npm run build:prepare && run-p build:angular:* && run-p compile:angular:*
scripts.build:angular:example: java -jar tools/openapi-generator-cli-6.0.1.jar generate -i api/example.openapi.yaml -g typescript-angular -o build/angular/example -c api/example.angular.config.json
